      • explore

        public void explore(float hoursellapsed)
        Description copied from class: WorldScreen
        The arbitrary rule is 1 encounter per day in the wild. TODO think of a better framework as design guideline for distance between towns, encounter ratio, etc. The game has changed a lot since 1.0 but the goal back then was to allow you to reach a new Town after an average of 4 fights (100% resource spending). Now Fortifications and hostile Towns change everything. The ultimate goal still is to make every move strategically meaningful (no no-brainers) while still keeping the world scre en smal enough to fit in just a few screens worth of size.
        Overrides:
        explore in class WorldScreen

        Description copied from class: WorldScreen

        x - Coordinate, used for DungeonScreen.
